physical_appearance:\The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. There is just a single set of railroad present in the photograph. A train is travelling on that railroad. The shadow of the trees
 occupying the hill on the right side of the photograph
 is cast on the top of the train. The numerals
 \\26100\\

metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. There is just a single set of railroad present in the photograph. A train is travelling on that railroad. The shadow of the trees, occupying the hill on the right side of the photograph, is cast on the top of the train. The numerals, ""26100""
